mtha' gnyis kyi lta ba dang bral ba yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / 'dod pa'i bde ba dang phrad par brtson zhing bdag gi bde ba lhur len pa'i sems can skyo bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams

mngon par 'byung ba dang / khams gsum pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i sngon gyi ltas yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / rang la rag las par spyod cing gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa la bsten pa'i

phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi bsnyengs pa thob pa dang / mthun par yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par 'byung ba dang / kye

rgyal ba'i sras chos nyid kyis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' srid pa'i tha ma ba ni gdon mi za bar mngon par 'byung ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir mngon par 'byung ba yongs su ston pa

dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar dma' ba la mos pa'i sems can gyi khams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams

dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / lta ba'i rnam pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams gyen du bskyod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / las dang bya bas 'khyams par gyur pa'i sems can rnams la las kyi rnam par

smin pa mngon sum du bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas par chos nyid rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams

dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / bdag gi dub pa nye bar zhi zhing mthu dang ldan pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / ma yin na chos la chags pa rnams

kyi don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / 'dod pa'i bde ba dang phrad par brtson zhing rang gi bde ba lhur len pa'i sems can rnams skyo bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang /

byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsams pa'i khyad par yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / skye bo phyi ma rnams brtson 'grus rtsom pa la yang dag par sbyar ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'

rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / ma yin na dbang po yongs su ma smin pa'i lha dang / mi rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i dus bsdad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams dka' ba spyod pa ston pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu

po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir dka' ba spyod pa'i sbyor ba yongs su ston pa dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar

'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu bskyod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang /

'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du bdag gi lus rnam par phye ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang / sngon lhan cig tu spyod pa spyod pa'i grogs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskul ba'i phyir/

byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang / snying po byang chub kyi rgyan rnam par phye ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang / sems can ji ltar mos pa rnams la lus dang spyod lam dang / byang

chub kyi shing gi rgyan rnam par phye ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du blta ba'i phyir/ byang chub

sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang / gom pa dor ba dang / 'deg pa thams cad du ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo la snyoms par 'jug cing / skad cig skad cig du rnam par 'tshang rgya ba las mi 'da' ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems

dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi mgon po thams cad kyi mchod pa

blang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes chen pos rnam par phye ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par blta ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

yid la byed cing / phyogs thams cad du rnam par phye ba'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub tu 'dod pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub

sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub tu 'gro ba sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir yongs su bstan pa dag go/ //sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ /bam po nyi shu gsum pa/ /

kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub la 'dug pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rab tu bskyod cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /'jig rten

gyi khams thams cad snang bar byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob cing /

byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan seng ge'i khri la rnam par lta zhing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /yid nam mkha' dang mnyam pa la rnam par mi rtog cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po

byang chub la 'khod do/ /ji ltar mthun pa'i lus dang spyod lam yongs su ston cing byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /rdo rje'i snying po'i ting nge 'dzin rjes su rtogs par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs rnam par dag pa'i gnas yang dag par len cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do/ /bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus 'gro ba thams cad byin gyis rlob cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang

chub la 'khod do/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'dug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub kyi mchog la 'khod nas kyang ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu 'byung ste/ bcu gang zhe

na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de la snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis zhal mngon par bstan te/ phyag g.yas pa brkyang

zhing / kye ded dpon chen po rgyal bar gyur cig /rgyal bar gyur cig ces gsung brjod de 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang po'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad dgongs pa

dang / byin gyis rlob pa yang dag par mdzad de 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gnyis pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sngon lhan cig du spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'ongs te/ byang chub sems

dpa' de dag la kun nas bskor cing mchod pa'i las rnam par phye ba rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par bsgrub ste/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gsum pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rtswa

dang gel ba dang / sdong po dang / nags tshal thams cad kyang bsam pa yod go lta ste/ snying po byang chub gang na bder 'dud cing phyag 'tshal te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bzhi pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i tshe yang

chos kyi dbyings rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos lnga ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras rgya mtsho mchog gi dam pa dri

ma med cing kun nas snang la 'od gsal ba'i sa'i snying po la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin chen pos kun nas yog par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos drug pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub

kyi mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / rim gror bya ba shin tu rgya chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad du 'byung ste/ 'di ni ngo mtshar

rmad du byung ba'i chos bdun pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ye shes mchog gi sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang / dbang po dang spyod pa mngon du 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad

du byung ba'i chos brgyad pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la blo shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu nam mkha'i dbyings tshad med pa dang / dus gsum rgyas par

'gengs pa'i lus kun nas gnas par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dgu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las dus thams cad la yang dag par gzhol zhing ye shes chen po chags

pa med pa rdul dang bral ba'i snang ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu pa'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub mchog la gnas

pa rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag go /kye rgyal ba'i sras don rnam pa bcu po 'di dag gi dbang yang dag par mthong nas snying po byang chub mchog la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston te/ bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam

klas pa na thab mo dang / g.yul la mos pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi che ba nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /yid gnyis dang the tsom du gyur pa'i mi dang lha rnams kyi yid gnyis dang the tsom gcad pa'i

phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /bdud kyi sde yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /thab mo dang g.yul la mos pa'i lha dang mi rnams kun nas bsdu ba dang / kun nas 'dus pa'i lha dang mi rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /byang chub

sems dpa'i mthu la thub pa med pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /sems can gzhan mos shing spro bar bya ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /phyi ma'i skye bo rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /snying po byang chub kyi bar gyi bdud kyi las yongs su bstan pa dang /

byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'das pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /nyon mongs pa'i stobs kyis nyams smad cing stobs med par byas pa yongs su bstan pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa dang / byams pa'i stobs yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir

bdud 'dul ba ston to/ /kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa dag tu chos nyid rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras/ don bcu po de dag gi dbang mthong bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba

ston to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ kye rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud dang las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad las 'das shing byang chub

sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la rnam par rtse ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan 'byam klas pa thams cad dang ldan pa yin/ chos dkar po'i tshogs thams cad yang dag par bstsags pa yin/

chos snang ba rnam par dpyad par bya ba thams cad shin tu rnam par phye ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin/ sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems dang dbyangs su ldan pa yin/ byin gyi rlabs thams cad kyis rab tu chog por byin gyis brlabs pa

yin/ 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rnam par mi rtog pa thob pa yin/ skad cig gcig gis dus gsum rnam par 'tshang rgya ba yin/ shin tu rnam par sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang rab tu thob pa yin/

de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin/ zag pa zad pa shes pa'i bar gyi stobs dang ldan pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs

pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste/ stobs bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rnam pa bcu bskor te/ rnam pa bcu gang zhe na 'di ltar 'jigs pas shin tu sbyangs pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa dang / so sor yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i sgra rjes su bsgrags pa dang / bden pa bzhi'i tshul gyis shin tu brtags pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi

rnam par thar ba bsgribs pa pa'i rjes su song ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / thogs pa cing blta bar dka' la g.yo ba cing sdug bsngal gyi gsal shing 'byin pa dang / sngon gyi snying rje chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams

cad du grag pa dang / bskal pa grangs par chos ston par rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / dbang po dang stobs dang byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa dang / legs par spyad pas bskor ba'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras

sgo rnam pa bcu po de dag la pa rnam pa tshad par de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo de ni sems can gzhan gyi rgyud la chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcus

thogs pa pa dang / mngon par chags pa par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam thams cad kyi stobs kyi shugs dang / snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad mi gtong ba dang / ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa

bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa dang / dus la bab par thob par byed pa dang / rigs pa'i tshul bzhin du 'khrul pa dang / dus gsum shes par bya ba rab tu rtogs pa dang / lus kyi dbang zil gyis mi non pa dang / tshig gi dbang par dka' ba dang / ye shes

kyi dbang tshigs bzhin du khong du tshud par byed pa ste/ kye rgyal ba'i sras chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcu po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la thogs pa pa dang /

mngon par par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas kyi phrin las rdzogs par mdzad zin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni don bcu'i dbang gzigs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po ston te/ bcu gang zhe na

'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed rtag pa yongs su bstan pa dang / 'dus byas thams cad yid brtan du mi rung bar bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs bde bar 'gro bas 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba thams cad dang bral ba yang dag par bstan pa dang / gzugs

kyi lus la zhen pa'i lha dang rnams la gzugs kyi lus rtag pa nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang / chos kyi sku la yang dag par sbyar ba dang / rnam par 'gyur ba'i mthus phyir zlog par yongs su bstan pa dang / 'du byed thams cad 'dod dgur rung zhing dbang bsgyur du pa yongs su

bstan pa dang / sa gsum gyi 'khor ba thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bur yongs su bstan pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni snying po dam pa ste/ 'jigs pa'i chos nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang / kun 'byung zhing 'jig pas 'bral bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang / kye rgyal

ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid kyis kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las thams cad rdzogs par mdzad de/ dgongs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu bskor te/ 'dul ba thams cad shin tu dul nas byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad shin tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/ mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen por yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras don bcu po de dag yang dag par gzigs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyam pa pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su ston to/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mang pos gsungs pa'o/ /

don tshang pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o/ /mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / smon lam chen po rgyun 'chad par byed pa'o/ /sems can gang gis 'di thos par gyur te/ thos nas kyang mos par byed pa dang / mos par

gyur nas kyang nan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa de dag thams cad myur du bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub ni byang chub sems dpa' nan tan lhur byed pa rnams kyis 'grub kyi nan tan

dang ldan pa rnams kyis ma yin no/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nan tan la gnas pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang yon tan gyi 'byung gnas don rnam par gdon za ba'i me tog chos kyi sgo thams

cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/ ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba/ 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa/ chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed par 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig

rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di rim gror byas te/ mnyan par bya'o/ /blang bar bya'o/ /yongs su gzung bar bya'o/ /yongs su bzung nas kyang nges par rtogs pa'i sgos yongs su sbyang ba dang / smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa la

brtson par bya'o/ /kye rgyal ba'i sras de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dkon pa ma yin no/ /'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u chos thams cad kyi sgor yang dag par gzhol ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di

bstan pa'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i chos nyid thob pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad grangs pa rnams rab tu g.yos par gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas shing gsal

bar gyur to/ /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang dgyes par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la zhal bstan nas gsung brjod pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras legs so legs so/ /ji ltar khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la

'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang / yon tan gyi 'byung gnas don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba ye shes kyi sgo la 'jug pa 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das

pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di bstan pa ni rgyal

ba'i bu khyod chos 'di dag la legs par bslabs pas shin tu byang ba ste/ rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi byin gyi rlabs dang mthus/ mos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bshad de nged kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so/ /de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad

kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so/ /kye rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di da lta dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma thos pa'i chos thos par bya ba'i phyir nged kyis byin gyis brlab pa mdzad do/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu

bzang pos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur bltas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad la bltas nas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcud pa 'di dag smras so/ /gang rnams de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag

khrig stong du brtul zhugs dka' spyad pa/ /gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong las byung ba'i chos kyi sras/ /gang rnams de dag sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong rnams byang chub rab 'god pa/ /dpe zla pa de dge rnams kyi spyod pa bshad kyis rtse gcig mnyan par

byos/ /gang dag sangs rgyas khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas gnas pa/ /gang dag nyon mongs bcings pa'i 'gro ba thar byed sems can 'du shes mi gnas dang / /gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu tshol yang yon tan gnas pa/ /de

dag 'jig rten rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i spyod mchog mdzes pa brjod par bya/ /gang rnams de dag srid pa gsum na las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi dbang song snang / /gang rnams de dga' 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan zhing khyu mchog spyod pa ston pa po/ /gang rnams de dag gti mug nyon mongs

nyes bral bsam pa zhi zhing rab zhi ba/ /'gro ba rnams la spyod pa'i rim pa ston pa de dag yon tan brjod par bya/ /gang rnams de dag bdud g.yo 'gro ba kun las rgal te thams cad dbang byed pa/ /'gro ba thams cad bdag la sprul pa sna tshogs tha dad mtha' yas rab tu ston/ /sems

bskyed gyur ma thag tu gnas dang 'jig pa'i bya ba thams cad ston byed pa/ /de dag yon tan sna tshogs mdzes pa sems can dga' bar byed pa brjod par bya/ /srid pa'i rgyud na sems can sdug bsngal nyen cing skye dang rga bas gzir ba dang / /'chi dang mya ngan dag gis gtses shing

gnod byas nyon mongs kun tu gzir mthong nas/ /de dag thar bar bya phyir snying rje rgya cher bskyed nas ye shes mchog dgod pa/ /de dag yon tan shin tu dge ba phyogs tsam bshad kyis rtse gcig mnyan par byos/ /sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga' bar bsam

gtan la yang rnam par rtsen/ /shes rab thabs kyi pha rol phyin cing byams dang snying rje lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / /dga' ba'i chos la brtson zhing btang snyoms dga' bas bskal pa brgyar yang spyod spyad pa/ /de dag spyod ldan yon tan ldan pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan gyis de dag

nyon/ /gang rnams de dag byang chub gnyer phyir bye ba khrag khrig stong gi lus skoms pa/ /gang rnams byang chub zhi ba tshol phyir srog la lta ba par gyur pa dang / /gang rnams de dag sems can phan phyir rtag brtson bdag gi bde ba tshol ba/ /byams dang snying rje'i sems ldan

thub pa de dag kun gyi spyod mchog brjod par bya/ /rgya mtsho'i chu thigs bgrangs pa re res thams cad zad par bya bar rung srid kyi/ /de dag yon tan bskal ba bye ba khrag khrig du ma stong du brjod byas kyang / /dpe tsam bya bar mi nus legs par brjod cing bstan par nus 'on

kyang go/ /sems can phan pa'i don du sangs rgyas yul rnams bstan par bya ba mnyan par byos/ /gang dag 'gro ba rnams kyi don phyir dge ba kun 'dzin dkar po 'phel byed kyang / /mtho bar sems dma' bar sems dman chos tshol ngoms par yongs

mi 'gyur/ /'gro ba kun nas don gnyer chu klung ye shes mtsho chen shes rab shing sdong ste/ /ston pa'i mkhas pa de dag rnams ni sa ltar 'gro ba thams cad 'tsho ba yin/ /byams pa rlan yin snying rje rtsa ba dga' ba sdong po brtan pa sdom pa ste/ /ze ba ye shes dri ni

tshul khrims bzang po lo ma me tog yon tan can/ /sangs rgyas 'od kyis rab tu rgyas byas blo gros ldan pa sems can dgar byed pa/ /de dang de dag pad+mo lta bur 'dus byas ma gos 'gro ba rnams la snang / /sa bon mos pa sa gzhi bsam pa byams dang snying rje dag ni rtsa ba

ste/ /sdong po shes rab thabs ni yal ga lcug ma dag ni pha rol phyin rab lnga/ /bsam gtan shes rab mngon shes me tog rgyas pa kun mkhyen ye shes 'bras bu ste/ /chos kyi shing mchog rdzu 'phrul bya 'khod de dang des ni 'jig rten gsum po khebs/ /rim gyis dkar

yangs yongs su spel ba lus yin bden pa rnams ni rkang pa ste/ /dran pa mgrin pa spyod mchog shes rab mgo yin ral pa rnam par grol ba dge/ /stong pa don dam sul dang phug yin byams dang snying rje dag ni gnyis te/ /de dag seng ge lta bur

bdag sgra 'byin bdud sde rab tu skrag par byed/ /'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon nyon mongs mi zad 'khyams 'gyur te/ /bdud kyi bya ma rta dang rkun por bcas pas zin gyis gti mug mdongs gyur pa/ lam ni rab ston mkhas sems can mthong nas

ded dpon mkhas pa de dag ni/ /lam gyi mthar khrid 'jigs pa pa'i grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu 'god/ /'gro ba dag ni 'dod chags zhe sdang mun pa nyon mongs sna tshogs nad btab cing / /yun ring nas ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal dag la gzhol zhing sdug bsngal

rab 'bar ba/ /sems can mthong nas snying rje bskyed de nyon mongs pa yi nad pa kun gso zhing / /nad rnams zhi bar byed pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dam pa dag kyang ston/ /rgyal po lta bu de dang de dag 'khor rnams dga' byed 'gro la chos ston pa/ /sdig pa spongs

la dge la snyen cing sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyang tshol cig ces/ /rkang gnyis dbang po'i chos kyi yul la kun mkhyen ye shes dbang por dbang bskur ba/ /rgya chen byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas de dag 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i nor/ /tshul khrims lte ba

ting 'dzin mu khyud brgyan pa'i ye shes 'od dang shes rab mtshon/ /ye shes rno ba'i gzhung can nyon mongs 'joms zhing bdud kyi sde rnams dkrug byed pa/ /chos kyi sgron ma che 'byin mchog rnams de dang de dag sangs rgyas bskor ba yi/ /'khor lo mchog rnams bskor

zhing pha rol rgol ba dag dang mu stegs thams cad 'joms/ /ye shes chu ni zab cing zad shin tu rgya chen chos kyi ro dang ldan/ /byang chub yan lag de bzhin bsam gtan rin chen gang ba 'gro kun shes par dka'/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi mtha' rlabs mtha'

yas yul rnams dag cing lhag bsam dge /de dang de dag ye shes rgya mtsho mtshungs bstan pa zad par 'gyur ro/ /'jig rten rab 'phags rtag tu yul gyis gos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas gyur pa/ /bsam gtan mngon shes rab 'phel ye

shes rtse mo lhag pa'i bsam pa sgul ba/ /gang dag de dang nyer phrad shes rab ye shes mchog gis rab tu 'dra bar 'gyur/ /de dang de dag yon tan ri rab shes rab rab brtan 'gro ba kun gyis bltas/ /lhag pa'i bsam pa mchog gi rdo rje mtshungs

shing 'dra ste brtul zhugs thams cad brtan/ /sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yas bsam pa mi phyed de/ /bdud dang sems can nyon mongs 'jig rten rlung dag gis ni bskyod rab brtan pa/ /de dang de dag 'jig rten dam pa nyon mongs

'bar ba dag las bzlog par byed/ /byams pa'i sprin rnams kun 'dus snying rje stug po rig pa'i glog chen rgyu ldog pa/ /thub pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gnas bzhi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing rab tu sgrog /so so yang dag rig dang tshul khrims yan lag brgyad

ldan chu'i char 'bebs pa/ /de dang de dag sprin chen nyon mongs zhi byed sems can don phyir mngon par 'phags/ /shes rab dga' dang khrel ba dag ni 'obs te chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng / /ye shes shing thags yin te thar pa'i sgo phye dran pa de dag sgo ba

yin/ /bden pa rnams ni lam chen bzhi ste shin tu dge ba'i rdzu 'phrul rab brgyan pa/ /srid pa gsum na bdud sde dag gis thul grong khyer chos nyid dag tu ston/ /thams cad mkhyen gyi sems mchog shing la rab 'dug rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rkang pa brtan/ /gshog

pa thabs kyi stobs te pha rol gnon mthu byams dang snying rje gnyis yin/ /ston pa de dag 'gro ba kun na thub mkha' lding dbang po'i drag shul 'dra/ /srid pa'i mtsho nas 'don cing lha rnams kyang mya ngan 'da' ba'i mchog la 'god/ /tshul khrims dkyil 'khor

rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shugs ldan ye shes 'od zer phreng ba mdzes/ /'od snang kun 'char nyon mongs 'joms zhing srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu skem par byed/ /stobs dang dbang po dge ba'i sman 'phel sems can pad mo yongs su rgyas byed pa/ /de dang de dag

snang byed chos kyi nyi ma'i khyu mchog 'gro ba kun tu 'byung / /chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dkyil 'khor 'gro ba kun gyis blta na mdzes pa ste/ /nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs mang skar ma 'dra ba dag ni zil gyis mnan/ /sems kyi rgyud rnams mthong nas srid pa gsum

du 'phel dang 'grib pa rnam par ston/ /de dang de dag ye shes zla ba 'gro la 'char zhing mkhas pa nam mkha'i mtha'/ /chos kyi dbang po 'gro ba kun la dbang byed gzugs dang yon tan dag gis brgyan/ /ye shes rdo rje mnga' ba thabs ni ste chos la dbang chen bsgyur

gnas pa/ /lus dang mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po sna tshogs kun gyi blta ba'i dbang po ste/ /chos kyi 'gro ba kun las rgyal ba de dang de dag chos kyi dbang po yin/ /srid pa gsum na 'dod pa'i 'dam dang nyon mongs las las rab 'das kun dbang po/ /byams pa

snang dang thugs rje bsam gtan dga' dang btang snyoms rnams la mos/ /srid pa gsum po kun tu tha dad lus ston chos kyi sgras kyang go byed pa/ /de dang de dag tshangs pa lta bur rnam dag mos shing lta ba'i rnam pa sel/ /'khor las rab tu 'das shing rnam dag

yul dang ldan pa bdag po chos kyi dbang / /phyir ldog 'gyur blo gros che 'chang gang rnams theg pa dma' dang tha dad la/ /chos kyi dbang por dbang bskur 'jig rten dam pa ye shes phyir ldog 'gyur ba/ /thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan dbang phyug grags chen

de dang de dag 'jig rten dbang / /nam mkha'i mkha' dbyings lta bur dngos dang rnam bral pa thams cad rnam bstsal ba/ /'gro ba kun tu bya ba nyams len khyu mchog ci la 'ang gnas pa pa ste/ /'gro ba kun tu spyod pa dkar zhugs mkhas pa de dag rab

tu gnas pa/ /de dang de dag ye shes dge zhing dag pas shes rab nam mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra/ /de dang de dag shin tu rgya chen thabs ldan sa ltar 'gro ba kun gyi gsos/ /chu 'dra de dang de dag byams dang snying rjes nyon mongs rnams ni rab tu sel/ /de

dang de dag ye shes myes ni nyon mongs sreg cing bag chags bcas pa bstsal/ /ston pa de dag gnas rlung dang 'dra bar srid pa gsum na rab tu rgyu/ /de dang de dag rin chen 'dra ste shin tu dkon zhing 'gro ba dbul yang sel/ /de dang de dag rdo rje lta bur srid

pa gsum na lta ba kun tu 'joms/ /de dang de dag yon tan kun gyi 'phring ba sna tshogs 'jig rten gsum mdzes byed/ /ston pa de dag nor bu rin chen mtshungs 'dra spyod pa kun gyi gtsug tu phyin/ /de dang de dag me tog lta bur yon tan rab rgyas byang chub

yan lag rtse/ /phreng ba lta bur de dang de dag smon lam bcings shing 'jig rten mgon la gnas/ /de dang de dag tshul khrims ma nyams skyon med rnam dag dri ni dri rab zhim/ /de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum na chos dang ye shes kyi ni bag chags dag /gdugs 'dra de dang

de dag stobs kyi bla res nyon mongs rdul las skyob par byed/ /ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i thugs mnga' de dang de dag nga rgyal rgyal mtshan snyol/ /de dang de dag spyod pa'i ba dan sna tshogs yid 'ong ye shes kun tu 'phags/ /gos 'dra de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul

yon tan 'gro ba kun la khebs par byed/ /theg pa 'dra ba khyu mchog mtha' yas de dang de dag 'jig rten gsum las 'byin/ /de dang de dag rab dul glang po lta bur yid kyis rtag tu dul la gnas/ /de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul rtas ni khal chen khyer zhing 'jig

rten gsum las 'da'/ /klu yi dbang po lta bu de dang de dag sems kyi yul du chos char 'bebs/ /de dang de dag 'gro ba kun la me tog u dum ba ra mtshungs 'dra shin tu dkon/ /dpa' bo lta bu de dang de dag nyon mongs 'joms zhing bdud kyi sde rnams 'khrug /

ldog 'khor lo lta bu de dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyis rab tu btsud/ /de dang de dag sgron ma lta bur mun pa sel cing sems can lam yang ston/ /de dang de dag chu klung lta bur yon tan ded cing lam rgyud rjes su 'gro/ /de dang de dag

zam pa lta bur ngal ba par rtag tu 'gro ba sgrol/ /gru dang gru chen lta bur smon lam rab btab ye shes gangs chen mtsho thob byed/ /de dang de dag mnyan pa lta bur 'gro ba ye shes thang chen mchog la 'god/ /de dag skyed mos tshal gyi dga' la rtse zhing

'gro la yang dag spyod pa ston/ /de dag chos kyi rnam thar mngon shes me tog ye shes gzhal khang dag pa/ /mkhas pa de dang de dag sman ltar nad zhi byed cing nyon mongs rab tu sel/ /sman gyis rgyas pa'i gangs ri lta bur de dang de dag ye shes 'byung gnas so/ /de dag

sangs rgyas lta bur ye shes kyis ni 'gro ba gnyid log mun pa sel/ /yang dag sangs rgyas lta bur gzhan yid kyis 'gro ba yang dag rtogs par byed/ /de dang de dag rgyal ba ci 'dra de ltar 'ongs te mkhas pa de nyid gnas/ /de dag thams cad mkhyen pa lta bur ye shes

'byung gnas kun nas sgor yang zhugs/ /zhi ba skyed pa de dang de dag ston pas rab bsngags 'gro ba kun la ston/ /de dang de dag rang gi ye shes yul dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul shes/ /de dang de dag tshad dpung dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun na thub pa / /de

dag ye shes 'jigs blo gros 'chang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyang shes/ /gang na gang dag 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs dang rnams ji snyed snang yod pa/ /kun tu gzugs snyoms gzugs kyi rjes su song zhing dbyangs rjes su song ba yin/ /gzugs

rnams kun las 'das shing dang rnam par bral yang bya ba thams cad ston/ /de dag mthu ni 'gro ba rnams kyis rnam pa kun tu brjod par mi nus so/ /gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan thob cing dngos bral dngos po pa'i chos gnas shing / /yod dang pa'i mdud

pa thams cad bral ba mkhas pa ye shes mngon sum can/ /thams cad shes kyang ye shes rten pa ma yin ye shes de la gnas pa min/ /de dag spyod la 'jug pa yid 'ong 'jig rten dga' bar byed pa bshad par bya/ /chos kyi tshul ni sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dngos po dben

pa lta bur rab rtogs nas/ /mkhas pa sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis smon lam thabs dang snying rje dag kyang byed/ /sprul pa'i ye shes sgo dang ldan pas khyu mchog bya ba sna tshogs rab ston pa'i/ /byang chub sems dpa' ma nor yid can rtse gcig mnyam

pa pa legs par grag /lus gcig la ni mtha' yas lus dang rgya chen lus rnams tha dad rab tu ston/ /sems yid sems kyi yul 'on kyang 'gro ba kun tu de dag ston/ /khyu mchog brjod pa'i pha rol phyin pa de dag dbyangs gcig rnam par

rjod byed kyang / /'gro ba dag gi sgra skad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu brjod/ /nyon mongs rgyud byung lus dang bral yang sems can rnams kyi lus la dbang bsgyur te/ /brjod du pa'i tshul gyis zhi ba rtogs shing sgra rnams thams cad rab tu ston/ /

de dag sems kyi rang bzhin zhi zhing 'od gsal nam mkha' mtshungs par yang dag shes/ /'gro ba kun la bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs sgo nas 'jig rten sna tshogs ston/ /de dag lus rnams gang la'ang gnas pa de lus kyang de dag ston pa byed/ /'gro ba

thams cad kyi ni skye ba dag dang rgyu mthun gnas pa ji snyed pa/ /thams cad kun tu skye ba'i lus dang ldan yang skye ba dag la gnas pa / /rang gi lus la mkha' 'dra dngos bral sems can sems la sna tshogs rnam pa ste/ /mkhas pa kun la dbang bsgyur de

dag lus ni mtha' yas kun tu ston byed cing / /me tog dri dang byug pa phye ma sil snyan gdugs dang ba dan rgyal mtshan rnams/ /thams cad mkhyen la mchod pas rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten mchog la mchod byed cing / /mkhas pa bsam pa thag

pas lus kyis 'du byed mchod pa dam pa kun tu ston/ /mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba zhabs kyi drung 'khod rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ /'khor rnams kun na snang zhing mtshungs de dag zhu ba kun kyang zhu ba byed/ /chos kyi dam pa thos nas ting 'dzin re re mtha'

yas sgo ldan thob gyur cing / /blo gros ldan pa de snyed rnam par ldan pa ston pa byed kyang zad pa / /'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas shes rab ye shes thabs kyi pha rol phyin/ /sgyu ma lta bu'i chos dang gzugs spobs mtha' yas dang ba 'gro ba kun la ston/ /

sna tshogs gzugs dang sgra rnams mtha' yas shin tu rgya che sems kyang rab tu ston/ /'gro ba thams cad la ni 'du shes dra ba 'jug pa ston kyang gnas pa / /'gro don rjes 'gro de dag la la dag tu thog ma'i sems su 'gro la ston/ /la lar 'gro ba kun la

byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas rgya chen dag kyang ston/ /la lar sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus brtan dang shes rab rnams/ /la lar tshangs pa'i lam sdud kha cig tu ni spyod pa mchog kyang rab tu ston/ /mkhas pa rtog de dag la lar spyod pa

rdzogs shing bzod pa thob pa ston/ /la lar skye ba gcig gis thogs par nges shing la lar rgyal bas dbang bskur ba/ /la lar nyan thos gzugs su gyur cing la la dag du rang rgyal gzugs su 'gyur/ /bye ba khrag khrig mang po'i zhing du mya ngan 'da' yang spyod las

ldog pa / /de dag la lar lha dbang brgya byin lha dang bcas pa la lar tshangs par 'gyur/ /de dag la lar lha'i bu mo brgyas bskor la lar gcig pu spyod par ston/ /la lar dge slong rab tu zhi zhing yid zhi la lar rgyal po dbang phyug 'gyur/ /la lar chos kyi dra

bar 'jug pa'i ye shes khyu mchog gzugs kyang rab tu ston/ /la lar bud sgyu rtsal pha rol rab phyin la lar dka' thub can du 'gyur/ /la lar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen ston cing la lar bsam gtan thub pa byed/ /la lar mya ngan 'da' dang tshe'i sa dang la lar

rgan dang byis par ston/ /de dag spyod pa bsam na skye bo mos par 'gyur te yid gnyis rnyed par 'gyur/ /la lar lha dang 'grogs shing la lar shi 'pho la lar mngal 'gro gnas par ston/ /la lar mngal zhugs la lar rnam par sangs rgyas la lar

'khor lo rab tu bskor/ /la lar skye ba la lar mya ngan las 'das pa la lar bzo yang rab tu slob/ /la lar bud tshogs kyi dbus gnas la lar ting 'dzin la lar mngon par 'byung / /la lar khyu mchog byang chub dam par sangs rgyas byang chub shing gi drung

na bzhugs/ /la lar 'khor lo rab tu bskor zhing la lar sna tshogs chos rnams yongs su tshol/ /la lar sangs rgyas gyur cing zhing rnams bye ba brgyar khyab 'gro bar ston byed kyang / /byang chub don du spyod pa dag gi tshogs rnams las kyang phyir ldog ma

yin no/ /bskal pa'i grangs la 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin pas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya dag /khyu mchog sems gcig nang ston sems gcig bskal pa brgyar yang de bzhin ston pa byed/ /'gro ba thams cad la'ang rtog dang rtog pa yi yul rnams thams

cad ston/ /pa cing phyogs la gnas spyod pa de dag kun kyang rab tu ston/ /gang phyir rgyal ba nye rgyal de dag nyi tse'i phyogs kun na bzhugs pas na/ /'gro ba kun gyi rgyal ba ji snyed pa dag thams cad rdul gcig steng du mthong / /

sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsgrub dang sems can yul dang chos kyi rgyu tshul rnams kyang mthong / /de ltar brtson pas bskal pa khrag khrig brtson byed 'on kyang cha shas zad mi 'gyur/ /de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi sems can tshul rnams mtha' yas rgya che rab tu shes/ /

sems can gcig la mtha' yas lus dang rgyu dang bye ba khrag khrig yod pa rnams/ /de dag 'gro ba gcig dang ma lus thams cad dag la rnam pa kun tu ston pa byed/ /bslab pa 'di yi phyogs la pha rol phyin te ma bslabs rnams ni ston pa byed/ /dbang po rnon

po dang ni 'bring dang gang dag dbang po rtul ba'ang rab shes nas/ /'gro bar skal ba yod dang skal ba med pa'i dbang po'i 'khor lo skor ba byed/ /dbang po re re la yang dbang po thams cad rnam pa phan tshun gnas pa dang / /dbang po'i dngos po phra ba'i

tshul dang gang dag dbang po brtan pa 'ang rab tu shes/ /de ltar khams dang mos dang bsam pa spyod dang nyon mongs bag chags rnams kyang shes/ /sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yi sems spyod da ltar byung ba'ang de bzhin te/ /sems can kun gyi spyod pa'i pha rol phyin

kyang 'od dang 'gro ba yod ma yin/ /ma nor spyod pa shes nas 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dam pa ston pa byed/ /de ltar sems kyi sems spyod sna tshogs kun nas nyon mongs nyon mongs pa dag /sems gcig la ni khong du chud nas byang chub mchog tu kun mkhyen rnams sangs rgyas/ /

sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba rnams phye rang gi shes pas rtogs gyur nas/ /sems kyi tshul shes sems rab tu gzhol bas ye shes mchog la kun kyang 'god/ /rdzu 'phrul mchog thob ye shes khyu mchog mngon par shes pa kun gyis rab tu 'phags/ /

sems bskyed gcig gis khrag khrig mtha' yas zhing dang phyogs rnams thams cad du yang 'gro/ /de ltar ye shes dbang bsgyur 'gro zhing bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig zad byed kyang / /sgra rgyud shin tu phra ba gcig la zhugs par gnas las gar yang 'pho ba / /'tsho ba'i

don du sgyu mkhan gzugs rnams sna tshogs 'gro ba kun la ston byed kyang / /sgyu ma kun btsal gzugs su gzugs yod ma yin par yang pa / /de ltar mkhas pa ye shes thabs dang shes rab rgya chen sgyu mar zhugs pa rnams/ /sprul pa

phun sum tshogs pas 'jig rten phal chen khyab par byas shes rab tu ston/ /nyi ma zla ba mkha' la rgyu zhing mdzes la shin tu 'phags pa rnams/ /ma rnyogs chu rnams ji snyed dag tu snang yang de ni chu dang 'dres ma yin/ /de ltar chos nyid dag pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog la shes

pas shin tu 'phags pa rnams/ /'gro ba dag pa'i sems kyi yul la snang yang 'gro ba dag dang mdzes ma yin/ /la la gnyid log lam dag na bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad byed/ /lo ni bye ba khrag khrig mang po zad par rmis kyang mtshan mo de ma zad/ /de ltar chos nyid rang bzhin

mtshungs par rjes rtogs bya ba sna tshogs kun ston te/ /skad cig gcig la bskal pa bye ba zad byed de dag ye shes zad 'gyur/ /ri yi dbang po'i ri sul gnas pa 'jig rten dag dang mnyam du thos pa'i sgra/ /kun nas sgra'i sgra brnyan de dang 'dra bar brjod kyang rtog cing

g.yo ba / /de bzhin chos kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i khyu mchog byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dag /rtog pa par sems can sgra rnams ji snyed par ni chos dang spyod pa ston/ /dpyid zla dag gi smyig rgyu g.yos la ji ltar sems can chur ni 'du shes nas/ /

de nas chu rnyed 'gyur rab tung du cing je bas je skom rnam 'phel ba/ /de ltar mkhas pa thar la zhugs pa sems can dag gi nyon mongs g.yo ba rnams/ /shes pas rtogs nas sems can 'du shes bya phyir zhing bya ba rnam par 'phel/ /gzugs ni dbu ba

lta bur khyu mchog ston te tshor ba chu'i chu bur 'dra/ /'du shes thams cad smyig rgyu lta bur rag las 'du byed chu skyes shing dang 'dra/ /sems ni sgyu 'dra bsgrub bya skyed byed de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs rab tu ston/ /de ltar phung po dgod pa ston kyang dbang bsgyur dag ni de la gnas

pa / /skye mched stong ba'i rang bzhin dbang 'khrul 'khor bya ba kun tu 'byin byed dang / /khams ni chos kyi dbyings mtshungs dngos po dag dang bral bar 'gro ba rnams la ston/ /dam pa'i don tshul zhi ba las ni bden pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu ston/ /de ltar de

dag chos tshul rnam par dgod pa ston pa byed kyang gnas pa / /'ong ba cing phyogs su 'gro ba la rgyud du gnas pa'i/ /nyon mongs rgyu las byung ba'i las dang las las sdug bsngal de ltar lam gsum du/ /rkyen la rag las 'byung ba rnams dang yod dang

las rab tu 'das pa yi/ /yang dag don dam dbu ma'i lam ni dngos po la gnas pa rab tu ston/ /skad cig gcig la dus gsum khong du chud kyang skad cig sna tshogs rnams kyang bstan/ /'dod dang gzugs khams kyi yul

dang bya ba sna tshogs ston par byed/ /sdom pa gsum gyi spyod dang rab tu ldan zhing thar pa gsum yang rab tu ston/ /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gcig la theg pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa de bzhin ston/ /gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rab tu dbye ba'i chos dang dbang po pha rol

phyin/ /khams dang mos pa dag dang nyon mongs rnam 'byed kun tu 'gro ba thob gyur pa/ /gi yul gyur sngon gyi gnas pa dran zhing nyon mongs zhi bar mkhas pa dag /sangs rgyas stobs bcu dag gis ye shes shin tu yangs kyang stobs la pa / /sangs

rgyas thams cad rjes su dpog stong 'gro ba kun tu mngon sum chos bzhed de/ /nyon mongs zag pa lhan cig skyes pa mnga' byang ba'ang brnyes par 'gyur ba / /'byung bas thugs su chud pa'i ye shes rgya chen des ni 'gro ba 'don pa mdzad/ /'di yi gnas la rgyal

sras 'jigs pa cing 'on kyang zhi bar spyod pa / /'khrul ba mnga' lam las g.yo ba'ang mnga' dgongs pa nyams pa 'ang mi mnga' ste/ /mos dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par 'byed pa ye shes gang du 'ang nyams pa / /thams cad mkhyen

mdzad sdom pa gsum mdzad dus gsum kun la mngon sum mkhyen mnga' ba/ /'gro ba kun gyis ma thob byams pa'i chos nyid 'phrogs chags pa brnyes pa/ /chos sgo gang dag gis ni spyod pa 'di dag rab tu thob pa smra ba'i mchog /de dag yon

tan mang po don gyis brgyan pa'i phyogs tsam bdag gis brjod par bya/ /de dag spyod pa bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu brjod kyang zad par nus te/ /'on kyang ji ltar sa las rdul 'dra ye shes spyod pa phyogs tsam brjod par bya/ /sangs rgyas ye shes rten ldan

bsam pa thob pas ngo mtshar 'du shes gnas pa rnams/ /spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing byams pa'i rjes song brtson 'grus brtan pas rnam gnon cing / /tshul khrims g.yo dbugs phyin de dag 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed/ /lung bstan rab tu thob

nas rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin thob par byed/ /sangs rgyas yon tan dag la zhugs kyang sems can sems dang zhing la sems pa byed/ /bskal pa'i dus la 'jug pa'i ye shes ldan zhing mkhas pa skyo ba'i 'du shes / /gzungs kyi tshul

dang yang dag tha dad stobs rnams thob cing yang dag don gyis rgal/ /bstan pa mtshungs sems kyis mkhas pa byang chub zhi ba rnam par 'tshang yang rgya/ /sems kyi spyod pa thams cad bzang po'i yon tan spyod pa'i mchog tu smon par byed/ /snying rje'i rkyen dang

byams pa mchog sten byang chub dam pa spyod par byed dang ldan/ /brtson pas pha rol phyin rtogs rab tu mkhas shing skyo ba'i pha rol phyin gyur pas/ /khyu mchog mos dang rab tu rtogs pa'i stobs thob byang chub dam pa mngon 'tshang rgya/ /mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa thob

cing ye shes tshul gyis chos mchog ston byed pa/ /yon tan thob byed spobs dang ldan pa de dag chos kyi dbang phyug mchog tu 'gyur/ /dbang la gnas kyang gnas pa pas mnyam pa pa'i sems kyi 'brug sgra sgrog /ye shes mchog dang de bzhin sprul

pa sgrub cing byang chub nye bar 'gro/ /mkhas pa de dag bskal pa 'byam klas byin rlabs shes pas dbugs phyin rab tu 'thob/ /zab la gnas pas brtan par 'gro na gnas shing nem nur bstsal bas mkhas pa rnams/ ye shes bsam gyis mi

khyab chos kyi dgongs pa mkhas shing rnam phye pha rol phyin/ /snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye shes yul la zhugs nas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya/ /ye shes rnam thar kun gyi pha rol phyin cing mngon par shes pas rnams par rtsen/ /rig pa'i snang

ldan rnam grol nyon mongs bral bas 'gro la skyed mos tshal dang 'dra/ /gang la dkar ba'i spyod pa'i gzhal khang mdzes sna tshogs spyod pa ston pa po/ /'gro ba kun la rgyan rnams du ma rab tu ston kyang sems las g.yo ba / /

bsam pa shin tu shes pas brtan pa rab tu mkhas shing pha rol phyin gyur pas/ /mkhas pa dag ni dag cing sbyangs pa'i byang chub phyag rgya snang ba'i ye shes kyis/ /'gro ba dag dang mtshungs zhum khyu mchog lhag pa'i bsam pa ri bo 'dra/ /ye shes rgya mtsho 'dra dang

yon tan zad don du spyod pa chen po spyod/ /de dag rin chen 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rje lta bu'i go cha bgos pas gnas/ /shin tu rgya chen rtsom la rab tu mkhas shing 'gro ba kun na thub pa/ /byang chub mchog tu lung bstan skyon khong du chud pa'i rgya chen

sems la gnas/ /sangs rgyas gter mchog mi zad thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'tshang rgya'o/ /rtag tu kun rdzob shes pas dbang 'gyur rnam par 'phrul pa rnams la mkhas pas na/ /zhing rnams kun dang chos kyi yul la rnam par 'phrul

ba'i ye shes rgyud la gnas/ /lus dang smon lam spyod yul ye shes rnam par 'phrul pa la yang de bzhin te/ /'gro ba dag la rnam par rtse ba bye ba khrag khrig du ma mang po ston/ /mngon par shes pa'i rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing nges par rnam par

rtse/ /khyu mchog de dag sangs rgyas yul la stobs thob 'gro ba kun gyis thub pa / /mkhas pa 'jigs pa dang bag tsha dang ma 'dres rnams kyis shin tu brgyan/ /sangs rgyas sras dag las rnams thams cad byed cing shin tu mdzes pa'i lus dang

ldan/ /de dag lus kyi las kyi dngos po shin tu rgya che dag kyang dag cing dge /de yang 'byin pa'i tshe na rgyal bas byin gyis brlabs shing las ni mchog kyang byed/ /dam pa de dag sems bskyed gcig la sems rgyas byed pa'i sems kyang rab tu ston/ /rgyal

ba'i dbang po thob pas rtag tu dbang po'i ting 'dzin dbang la rab tu gnas/ /bsam pa dag cing g.yo sgyu rnams dang bral te lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon sum gyur/ /mos pa'i 'jug pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad 'gro ba dag la rab tu ston/ /bag chags thams

cad spangs nas spyod pa dam pa rab tu 'dzin/ /nan tan bya ba grub pa'i ye shes mkhas pas thams cad mkhyen pa 'tshang yang rgya/ /bsam pa rnam par spangs nas de dag skyon med gnas pa zhi ba'i mchog kyang thob/ /mkhas pa 'di lam shin tu bslabs pa de dag ming ni

yon tan sgo nas grags/ /mtha' yas sems kyi yul ldan gnas pa par lam rnams yang du sgom pa byed/ /ye shes tshul la gnas shing 'gro ba rnams la lam gyi rgyan rnams shin tu ston/ /spyod pa lag pa lta bu dga' dang ldan pa lto yin snying po ye shes mchog /

snying ni rdo rje lta bu snying rje'i go bgos ye shes gdab pa'i mtshon cha yin/ /shes rab mgo ste chos rtogs yin byang chub spyod pa yang ni rna ba yin/ /tshul khrims dag cing nyon mongs la gtsang ste mun pa zhi byed sna yin te/ /spobs pa lce yin lus ni rig pa yin

te sems ni ye shes dam pa yin/ /spyod pa rgyu ba yin te byang chub shing gnas seng ge'i khri ni 'dug pa yin/ /tshangs pa'i lam rnams dag ni lam yin stong pa chags dam pa spyod yul lo/ /gang gi de dag snang bar 'gyur ba'i snang ba bde bar gshegs kyi ye

shes yul/ /sems can spyod la rnam par lta ba ye shes mchog ste rnam pa sna tshogs bsgyings/ /sems can dben zhing chags dang bral ba'i sbyin pa bsnyems pa pa'i tshul khrims dang / /bzod pa mi 'khrug brtson 'grus ldog dbang bsgyur ba ni bsam gtan

dam pa yin/ /rgyu ba cing nam mkha' 'dra ba shes rab byams pa sems can rnam par 'dren/ /skyo med snying rje rnam dag chos ni dga' ba nyon mongs gnas las btang yang snyoms/ /don ni zhi ba chos kyi yul la nye bar 'gro ba bsod nams 'gro la bsngos/ /ye shes

tshogs ni ral gyi rnon po lta bu snang ba chen po rig pa ste/ /'gro ba rnams la thos pa ston pas mi ngoms bskal par 'dren kyang 'jigs pa / /nan tan byed la gnas te bdud rnams btul nas bdud kyi lam yang rab tu bcad/ /rgyal ba

rnams kyi 'phrin las gang yin ye shes spyod dang lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dzin/ /nga rgyal las rnams rnam par spangs te rtag tu ye shes kyi 'ang bya ba byed/ /bdud rnams byin gyi rlabs bcom mkhas pa de dag sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis 'phags/ /chos kyi byin

gyi rlabs thob blo gros chen po 'chang ba lha yi gnas su 'dod/ /lha rnams byas te 'chi 'phos song nas mchog gi mngal ni shin tu phra bar 'gro/ /skye ba mchog ni nye bar bstan nas mchog gi gom pa bdun ni 'dor bar byed/ /mkhas pa de dag sems can kun la

bzo dang spyod dang btsun mo'i 'khor kyang ston/ /chags pa par mngon par byung nas byang chub shing drung chos kyi rgyan kyang byed/ /stong pa'i bstan las 'od zer dra ba yangs pa bkye zhing yang dag bskul ba byed/ /bdud rnams btul te byang chub go 'phang sangs rgyas

chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor/ /sangs rgyas sa yang rab tu bstan nas 'dren pa de dag mtshungs pa par bzhud/ /gang gis mkhas pa bskal pa bye bar rnam par rtse zhing yang dag byung gyur nas/ /sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma sangs rgyas yon

tan rab 'god kyang / /rnam pa kun tu sems can gnas chos lam yin spyod lam yin pa'i/ /de dag gi ni spyod pa 'di 'dra mtha' yas shin tu rgya chen mdor bstan to/ /de 'dra'i spyod dang ldan pa'i ye shes khyu mchog rdzu 'phrul dag gis rnam par rtse/ /zhing

rnams bye ba stong yang skra rtse gcig la bskal pa khrag khrig brgyar 'dzin te/ /lag tu khyer te zhing rnams bye bar 'gro yang lus la ngal dub gang yang / /mkhas pas khyer nas ji lta'i gnas su bkod kyang 'gro ba dag la gnod pa / /'jig rten mkhyen pa'i zhing

gi rgyan rnams ji snyed rnam pa tha dad bstan pa dag /kun kyang ba spu gcig gi bu gar khyu mchog de dag yang dag rab tu ston/ /mkhas pa ba spu'i bu gar rgya mtsho'i chu rnams ma lus khong chud rab ston kyang / /'phel zhing 'grib 'gro ba dag la gnod par 'gyur bya

ba de yang ston/ /khor yug khrag khrig shin tu phra ba'i rdul byas lag gis bsdus khyer zhing / /zhing rnams khrag khrig bye ma snyed du 'dor byed gcig tu gnyis kyang gzhog mi byed/ /zhing rnams de dag rdul du byas te de bzhin gzhan yang rnam par 'jig byed

de/ /de 'dra'i rjes su dpag pa zad par gyur kyang 'jug pa de dag mi zad do/ /'jig rten kun gyi nyi ma zla ba skar ma gang dag stong rnams ji snyed dang / /gang yang nor bu'i 'od dang yi 'od dang gang na gang rnams lha dbang 'od/ /mang po de dag rab tu 'das

pa'i 'od zer khrag khrig spu gcig khung nas 'gyed/ /'jig rten kun gyi ngan song sdug bsngal zhi bar byed cing chos kyi dam pa ston/ /'gro ba ma lus sgra yi rnam pa sna tshogs skad rnams thams cad ji snyed pa/ /khyu mchog de dag tshig gcig rab tu

brjod pas sgra rnams thams cad tshang bar brjod/ /srog chags bye ba rnams kyis yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur/ /rgyal bas bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam pa ji snyed thams cad de las thos par 'gyur/ /gang yang ji snyed 'das pa'i

bskal pa yod pa de dag ma 'ongs bskal par ston/ /gang yang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba ji snyed de dag 'das par ston/ /khyu mchog dag ni zhing rnams 'tshig dang gnas pa rnam pa tha dad ston par byed/ /'gro ba ji snyed thams cad mkhas pa de dag skra rtse gcig

la rab tu 'god/ /'das dang ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ji snyed pa/ /de dag thams cad rang gi lus las ma nor dbang bsgyur rnam par 'phrul ba ston/ /sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs la shes pa'i mkhas pa de dag 'gro ba ji snyed sems/ /

de snyed lus rnams rdul dang bral ba ston kyang lus la gnas pa gang yang / /lam rgyud drug po gang rnams ji snyed yod pa'i 'gro ba kun gyi lus bsdus shing / /brgya byin tshangs pa 'jig rten mgon po rnams dang de bzhin lha dang

yi rnams/ /gang yang nyan thos rang rgyal rnams la dad cing sangs rgyas sku la mos pa la/ /sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub pa'i spyod pa dag dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa ston/ /'gro ba kun gyi 'du shes dra ba rab dang 'bring dang tha mar 'jug pa rnams/ /

thams cad shes shing byin rlob byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing rnams kun kyang rab tu ston/ /'du shes dra ba rnams sgoms blo ldan 'jig rten 'du shes rnams la dbang bsgyur ba/ /bya ba dang ni sbyor ba ji snyed pa dang dkon mchog byang chub spyod pa ston/ /de dag de dang

rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu rgya chen dam pa gzhan yang ston/ /de dag gang la 'jig rten sa pa dang yul de dag bya ba ston/ /ston kyang lta ba lhur len ma yin gzhan yang phyir zhing gong du ston pa byed/ /de dag sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji bzhin spyod pa ji bzhin yang dag

'jug /lus ni nam mkha' lta bu dag dang yid la chags 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso/ tshul khrims spos kyi byug pa rab tu zhi ba gos yin yon tan sna tshogs rgyan/ /chos kyi go 'phang skyon thob cing thams cad mkhyen pa yid bzhin nor bu ste/ /bde gshegs kun gyi

ye shes dbang bskur thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal po'i thabs la gnas/ /pha rol phyin pa rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te glang po mngon par shes pa mchog /ye shes rdzu 'phrul rta ste chags pa 'gro shes rab nor bu dam pa yin/ /spyod pa btsun mo bzang mo bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi po khyim bdag dam pa'o/ /

thabs la shin tu mkhas pa blon po yin te mkhas pa de dag 'khor los sgyur/ /stong pa khyim ste ting 'dzin grong khyer mchog yin byams dang snying rje'i go ca'o/ /shes rab ral gyi yin te dran pa gzhu mdzes dbang po rno ba mda' yang yin/ /'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs ni

gdugs te ye shes rgyal mtshan bsgreng / /de dang de dag bzod pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi dpung dang sde rnams 'dus pa 'joms/ /gzungs ni sa ste byang chub spyod pa chu klung ye shes lu ma shes rab shing / /me tog byang chub yan lag ting nge 'dzin ni rta ste rdzu 'phrul

rnam par brgyan/ /stong pa rnam thar brgyad pa rdzing bu yin te rnam par dpyod pa bzang mo btsun mo yin/ /thar ba bdud rtsi bza' ba yin te chos ni btung ba theg pa gsum gyis rtse/ /de dag spyod pa de 'dra yid 'ong khyad par 'phags te de bas gong du mang / /gang gis

bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du skyo ba yongs su skyo bar/ /ston pa mchod cing rnam dag zhing la brtson pas 'gro ba ye shes mchog la 'god/ /kha na ma tho kun ye shes rab gnas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyas byed/ /zhing rnams rdul gyi 'brur blags re re nas kyang

bgrang zhing brtsi bar nus gyur la/ /bar snang mkha' chen 'di yang skra yis gzhal te zad par bya bar nus srid de/ /skad cig gcig la 'gro ba rnams kyi sems ni bgrang tshul shes par nus srid kyi/ /sangs rgyas sras rnams spyod pa dag ni bskal pa brgyar

brjod zad par nus so/ /gang zhig yon tan rnam dag 'di dag 'thob par 'dod cing gong du gzhan 'dod dang / /gang zhig sdug bsngal rnams las 'gro bar thar byas bde la 'god pa dang / /gang zhig bde bar gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs dang mnyam du

'gyur bar 'dod pa dag /des ni rdo rje lta bur brtan pa'i sems su gyis te yon tan bslab par byos/ /shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u ste/ bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o// //

sangs rgyas rmad gcad ces bya ba shin tu rgyas pa chen po'i mdo/ bam po nyi shu bzhi pa/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i dze ta'i tshal skyabs pa la zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba'i nang pho brang brtsegs pa rgyan chen po can na/ byang chub sems dpa'

kun tu bzang po dang 'jam dpal la pa 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa dam pa'i ye shes dang / brtan pa dam pa'i ye shes dang / chags dam pa'i ye shes dang / me tog dam pa'i ye shes dang /

nyi ma dam pa'i ye shes dang / zla ba dam pa'i ye shes dang / dri dam pa'i ye shes dang / rdo rje dam pa'i ye shes dang / rdul dam pa'i ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba dam pa'i chos ye shes dang / byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal

mtshan dang / ri rab rgyal mtshan dang / rin chen rgyal mtshan dang / chags rgyal mtshan dang / me tog rgyal mtshan dang / dri rgyal mtshan dang / nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang / mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / rdul rgyal mtshan dang / byang

chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen gzi brjid dang / blo gros chen po'i gzi brjid dang / ye shes rdo rje'i gzi brjid dang / dri ma pa'i gzi brjid dang / chos kyi nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang / bsod

nams ri bo'i gzi brjid dang / ye shes snang ba'i gzi brjid dang / kun nas dpal gyi gzi brjid dang / kun nas 'od dpal gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu snang bas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i gzi brjid dang / byang chub sems dpa'

sa'i snying po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / pad+ma'i snying po dang / rin po che'i snying po dang / nyi ma'i snying po dang / yon tan rnam dag snying po dang / chos rgya mtsho'i snying po dang / rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang / gtsug gi snying po dang / byang chub

sems dpa' pad+mo dpal gyi snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i dang / rnam par dag pa'i dang / dri ma pa'i dang / chags pa pa'i dang / kun nas lta ba'i dang / shin tu rnam par lta ba'i dang / ut+pa la'i

dang / rdo rje'i dang / rin po che'i dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i blo gros cod pan dang / byang chub dam pa'i cod pan dang / phyogs rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang /

sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par 'byung ba'i snying po'i cod pan dang / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i cod pan dang / kun nas rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang / zil gyis non pa pa'i cod pan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng

ge'i khri 'dzin pa'i cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' kun nas snang ba'i cod pan dang / byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang / klu'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa snang ba'i gtsug phud

dang / byang chub dam pa'i gtsug phud dang / smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rin chen rgyal po'i gtsug phud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu 'gyed pa'i nor bu rin chen 'brug sgra'i gtsug phud dang / nam mkha'i

dbyings thams cad tha dad par rnam par pa'i rin chen rgyal pos brgyan pa'i gtsug phud dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal po dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gtsug phud dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo sgrog pa'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i gtsug phud dang / byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen po'i 'od dang / gzi brjid dri ma pa'i 'od dang / rin po che'i

'od dang / rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang / skar ma'i 'od dang / chos kyi 'od dang zhi ba'i 'od dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang / ye shes dpal dang /

chos kyi dpal dang / mngon par shes pa'i dpal dang / 'od kyi dpal dang / me tog dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / byang chub kyi dpal dang / tshangs pa'i dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang / byang chub

sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / rgya mtsho'i dbyangs dngas sgra'i dbyangs dang / 'jig rten dbang po'i dbyangs dang / ri dbang rgyal po 'thab pa'i dbyangs dang / chos kyi dbyings kun tu rgyas pa'i dbyangs dang / chos rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang /

bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i dbyangs dang / snying rje chen po'i tshul gyi sprin rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i dbugs 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa'

chos kyis 'phags pa dang / khyad par gyis 'phags pa dang / ye shes kyis 'phags pa dang / bsod nams ri bos 'phags pa dang / yon tan gyi tshogs kyis 'phags pa dang / grags pas 'phags pa dang / kun tu snang bas 'phags pa dang / byams

pa chen pos 'phags pa dang / ye shes rgya mtshos 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi gdung gis 'phags pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dpal dang / mchog gi dpal dang / kun tu 'phags pa'i dpal

dang / rnam par snang ba'i dpal dang / chos kyi dpal dang / zla ba'i dpal dang / nam mkha'i dpal dang / rin po che'i dpal dang / dpal gyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ye shes kyi dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang /

chos kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / 'gro ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / tshogs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / lha'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / zhi ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / mi g.yo ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang / khyu mchog gi dbang

po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang / chags pa pa'i sgra dang / sa'i dbyangs kyi sgra dang / rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra dang / sprin gyi dbyangs kyi sgra dang / chos snang ba'i

sgra dang / nam mkha'i dbyangs kyi sgra dang / sems can kun gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu sgrog pa'i sgra dang / sngon gyi smon lam yongs su bskul ba'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil 'khor bcom zhing par byed pa'i sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'

rin po che'i blo dang / ye shes ri bo'i blo dang / nam mkha'i blo dang / dri ma pa'i blo dang / chags pa pa'i blo dang / rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo dang / dus gsum snang ba'i blo dang / yangs pa'i blo dang / kun tu snang ba'i blo dang / byang chub sems dpa'

chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i blo dang / de dag la pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tsam ste/ kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang / smon lam gyis byung ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pas/ chags pa
pa'i spyod yul can/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong bas lus mtha' yas pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa rnam par par bya

ba la bsgrib pa pa'i gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tshe/ nye bar 'dong ba rgyun gcod pas/ tshad par phyin pa/ chos rgya mtsho'i tshul thams cad la ye shes snang ba/ rab tu thob

pas snang ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par dag pas bskal pa mtha' yas par shin tu ston pa zad pa 'gro ba'i bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su ston pas nam mkha'i dbyings kyis klas pa'i ye shes kyi spyod
yul rnam par dag cing gnas pa/ sems can gyi khams sems can pa dang / srog pa yongs su shes pas rab rib pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra bas rgyas par 'gengs pas nam mkha'

dang mnyam pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so/ /nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa lnga brgya ste/ thams cad kyang bden pa'i tshul gyi rang bzhin mngon par khong du chud pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du gyur pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin la zhugs pa/ srid

pa'i rgya mtsho las gyen du 'phags pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshogs su 'gyur ba'i spyod yul can kun nas sbyor ba dang / bag la nyal ba dang bcings pa rnam par bzlog pa/ chags pa pa'i gnas la brten pa/ nam mkha' ltar zhi ba la rnam par spyod pa/

sangs rgyas la the tsom dang nem nur dang / yid gnyis yongs su chad pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la mos pa'i lam du zhugs pa sha stag dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba'i don du

zhugs pa/ gsol ba ma btab par dge ba'i bshes gnyen du gyur pa/ sems can gzhan bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sgo la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su gtong

pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i spyod yul la byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs yang dag par gzung ba'i smon lam gyis yang dag par skyes pa/ de bzhin

gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyud du 'byung ba mngon du gyur pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon par mos pa sha stag dang yang thabs gcig go /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dang / nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan pa/

de dag dang 'jig rten gyi dbang po 'khor dang bcas pa de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa'i stobs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsnyengs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnga' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang / sngon legs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi skyabs dang / dad pa'i yongs su dag pa dang / rgya

chen po la mos pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / bsam pa thag pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon cing yang dag par zhugs pa ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis 'jug pa'am/

khong du chud pa'am yid ches pa'am/ yongs su shes pa'am/ rnam par rtog pa'am/ gzung ba'am rnam par dpyad pa'am/ rnam par bsgom pa'am/ rnam par dbye ba'am/ rnam par dgrol ba'am/ rab tu brjod pa'am/ sems can pha rol gyi rgyud du phyin par bya bar ni

nus na/ bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang / sems can bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang / mos pa sna tshogs dang / shes pa sna tshogs kyi tshigs dang / brda sna tshogs su gyur pa/ dbang bsgyur ba'i sa

gzhan dang / gzhan la gnas pa dbang po sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa/ bsam pa dang sbyor ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan can/ sems dang bsam pa'i yul gzhan dang gzhan can/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ chos

bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan la mos pa dag la sngon thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems

dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su mnan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par

bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi rgyan yongs su dag par mdzad pa

lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrub pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa dang / rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa lta'ang

yang dag par bstan grang / byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgos rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor/

ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / khyu mchog gi mthu lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i

thabs kyi sgo lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos kyi grong khyer la mnga' mdzad pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi lam snang bar mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par

bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi gnas su gshegs shing rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi yon pa zhes pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs

pa sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams dang yon tan ston pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi tshul la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan

grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la yongs su bstan pa dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang

dag par bstan grang / de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul bsam gyis khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta 'ang yang dag par bstan grang snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems

dpa' de dag gi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nam mkha' dang mnyam pas dpe pa 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po'i sgo'i rang

bzhin can/ thugs rje chen po'i sgo dang ldan pa/ thugs rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba/ thugs rje chen po'i chos can la mnyam par gzhag go /bcom ldan 'das kyi de ltar mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu pho brang brtsegs pa rgyan chen po can yang mtha' dang dbus

par yangs shing rdo rje thub pa pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis sa'i gzhi rab tu bkod pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dra ba kun tu bkram pa/ rin po che du ma'i me tog sil mas chal bar gang ba/ nor bu rin po che dam pa mdzes par bkram pa

dang / bai DUr+ya'i ka bas mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba rnam par snang bas rgyan shin tu rnam par phye ba/ rin po che bzang po mang po dang ldan pa'i nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi phung pos shin tu brgyan pa dang / rin po

che thams cad las sgo gang dang / rta babs dang / pu shu dang / skar khung byas shing khri 'phang grangs pa rnam par dag pas brgyan pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'dra ba'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang / 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nor bu rin po che rnam

par phye ba dang / nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgreng ba dang / sgo dang rta babs thams cad las 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su rgyas par 'gengs pa rab tu 'byung bas rnam par mdzes par byas pa dang /

phyi rol gyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i gzhi stegs bu brjod du pas brgyan pa dang / phyogs kun nas them skas kyi phreng ba nor bu rin po ches brtsegs shing shin tu rnam par phye bas rab tu mdzes par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /dze ta'i tshal thams cad

kyang chu zheng gab par shin tu yangs shing rgya che bar kun nas gnas par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang chu zheng kun tu rgya che zhing yangs pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan

sna tshogs dang ldan zhing / sa'i gzhi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs brjod du pas kun nas grub pa dang / nor bu rin po che grangs pa'i ra bas kun nas bskor ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi shing ta la'i phreng bas mdzes par brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /

sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na spos chu'i chu klung tshad pa klong mtha' yas par 'khyil pa'i spos kyi chus yongs su gang ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi me tog mang po dang 'dres par gyur la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil cing 'bab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad dbyings

su sgrog pas rab tu brgyan par dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /rin po che'i me tog pun da ri ka'i phreng ba dang / rin po che'i shing gam yo rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rab tu rgyas shing / shin tu 'phags pas mdzes par brgyan pa dang / rin po

che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i phreng ba bsam gyis khyab pa nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa nor bu rin po che grangs pa'i dra ba kun tu snang bas brgyan cing mdzes pa dang / nor bu rin po che'i gzhal khang nor bu rin po che

thams cad kyis brgyan pa grangs pa spos thams cad kyi dad kun nas 'byung ba bdug spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /rin po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs pa dang / gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyal mtshan

dang / rin po che'i snam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / me tog gi rgyal mtshan dang / rgyan gyi rgyal mtshan dang / phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i rgyal ba'i gdugs kyi rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu

rin po che snang bas kun tu rgyas par 'gengs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal

mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang / nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad

phyogs kun nas rgyan tu gyur pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /dze ta'i tshal gyi nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyang lha'i gzhal khang gi sprin bsam gyis khyab pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur te/ dze ta'i tshal nyid kyang spos sna tshogs kyi

shing grangs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / brjod du pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyis kun nas 'khor cing rgyan pa dang / rol mo brdung ba dang / dkrol ba brjod du pa'i sprin las de bzhin gshegs pa

thams cad la bstod pa'i dbyangs dang nga ro snyan pa 'byung bas kun nas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i pad+mo brjod du pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i seng ge'i khri brjod du pa'i steng lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan bting ba la/ /byang chub sems dpa'

'khod cing de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byin pa'i sprin gyi kun nas brgyan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brjod du pa'i gzugs brnyan mngon par 'byung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i 'bru'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dkar po'i dra ba'i

sprin brjod du pas kun nas brgyan pa dang / mu tig dkar po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin brjod du pas kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang / rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i mu tig gi sprin brjod du pa'i char mngon par 'bab pas rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dkar po'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang / byin gyi rlabs/

bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir ro/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gcig tu zhugs pas/ sangs

rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su ston pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par

par yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa spu'i bu ga gcig tu sngon gyi mtha'i de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yongs su ston par mdzad pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin

gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od zer gcig gi sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa snang bar 'gyur ba bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa spu'i rtse mo gcig las sprul pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sangs

rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pa spu'i sgo gcig nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang / 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa bsam gyis khyab pa'i phyir ro/ /ji ltar dze

ta'i tshal de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par kun nas gnas par gyur pa de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par

kun nas gnas shing rab tu brgyan pa dang / shin tu spud pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su rgyas pa dang / dze ta'i tshul du yang dag par gzhol ba dang / byang chub sems dpas yongs su rgyas pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil

'khor rgya mtsho shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba dang / rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / zhing thams cad

kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyis kun nas yog par brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas kyi lus thams cad sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / me tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi sprin shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun gyis kun tu rgyas shing brgyan pa dang / gos thams cad

kyi shing gi sprin gyi mdzod nas gos kha dog sna tshogs su mdzes pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / phreng ba dang lda ldi dang se mo do'i rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rgyun mi chad par mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / spos sna

tshogs kyi bdug spos phyogs kun nas 'thul ba'i sprin dang na bun gyi char thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin las rin po che'i rgyal po'i phye ma zhib bu'i char rgyun 'chad par rab tu

'bab pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sprin lha'i bu mo'i lag na khyer ba nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu rgyu zhing 'khor bas brgyan pa dang / rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'dab ma'i dkyil 'khor can chu ba mthon po

dang ldan pa'i ze ba la rol mo bkod pa kun nas sgra 'byin cing dbyangs snyan par sgrog pas brgyan pa dang / rin po che'i 'bru sna tshogs kyi dra ba dang / rin po che seng ge'i dra ba sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i phreng ba dang / se mo dos brgyan par kun nas gnas shing

snang bar gyur to/ /de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa de la nyams par bzhag ma thag tu/ /de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba

snyed kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gser gyi sprin sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i smon lam gyi gtsug gi 'od zer snang ba

zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du pa'i rdul shin tu phra bsnyed dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i dbyings rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis brgyan pa dang / lha rdzas

kyi me tog gi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi char rab tu dgye ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad+mo'i sprin gyi char mngon par gtor ba dang / lha rdzas kyi phreng ba'i sprin gyi char rab tu btang ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i sprin gyi char

mngon par dbab pa dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par dgye ba dang / lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i gdugs kyi sprin gyi char mngon par bsgrub pa dang / kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad cing shin tu phra ba'i lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa
